features: Concentrated detergent formula is effective yet gentle on clothes
Contains plant-derived cleaning agents with dirt, stain-fighting enzymes, and other thoughtfully chosen ingredients
Biodegradable formula, HE laundry detergent for use in high efficiency and conventional washing machines
Garden-inspired Lavender scented laundry soap with an original and clean floral fragrance
Mrs. Meyer's products are made with cruelty-free formulas and are Leaping Bunny certified
body.description: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day HE laundry detergent features hardworking yet gentle cleaning agents, while also providing a special, singular scent for your home. Our Lavender scented laundry detergent has long been prized for its original and clean floral scent. Such a pretty and reassuring herb! Effective yet gentle on clothes, our concentrated laundry soap really packs a punch when it comes to removing dirt and grime. Contains surfactants from plant-derived sources, dirt and stain-fighting enzymes, essential oils, other thoughtfully chosen ingredients and, of course, are always made with a cruelty-free formula. This biodegradable formula liquid detergent is HE compatible. Concentrated for 64 loads of laundry. Also available in other garden-inspired scents and products such as body lotions, liquid hand soaps, candles, and so much more! Mrs. Meyer's - Rooted in Goodness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Making The World a More Greener Place One Garden At A Time Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day products are inspired by the garden, which is why we’re inspired to plant flowers, plants and trees. At Mrs. Meyer’s, we have a passion for the environment. We also know the importance of being a good neighbor in our home, our community and our world. That’s why we’ve made a commitment to improving the earth one flower, plant and tree at a time through our campaigns, partnerships, volunteering efforts and donations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Cleaning Power!
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried Mrs. Meyer’s for my laundry needs, and I must say, I'm thoroughly impressed! This detergent has exceeded my expectations in every way.First and foremost, its cleaning power is outstanding. Plus, it's gentle on fabrics, so I don't have to worry about it damaging my favorite garments.What sets Mrs. Meyer’s apart is its eco-friendly formula. Knowing that it's biodegradable and free from harsh chemicals gives me peace of mind. It's also suitable for both high-efficiency washing machines.The fragrance of the detergent is subtle yet pleasant. It leaves my clothes with a clean, crisp scent that lasts for days. I appreciate that it's not overpowering like some other detergents on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Story time! Recommend! Great laundry soap
reviews.reviewText: I have used this brand and scent on and off for years. I recently moved into my bfs place and he was using the T brand( full of toxic chems;look it up;) anyway, it made me extremely itchy, especially at night and I didn’t really care for the scent. So, I decided to get this again. Price is good and I remembered the smell wasn’t over powering ( if you don’t like strong smells or wear perfume) I didn’t want to mix a highly scented laundry soap smell with perfume smell..and it clash. Anyway, I got this and washed my bfs clothes. I had put his clothes away and the next day, when he came home from work, he changed out of his work dress shirt and into a laundered basic tee and we cuddled on the couch reading antique finds, I kept smelling something that smelled good. It was him. But, it was a faint, but lovely scent and I kept getting wifts of it ever so often. I looked up at him as he was going through the photos, eyeing him suspiciously. I would go back to looking through the listings and finally I couldn’t take it;I NEEDED to know what that smell was!; I buried my face into his shirt, snorting it up like a manic ( not literal) and realized it was the lavender. He looked down at me with a bewildered look and all I could muster with a smile, was: you smell nice.This is my opinion. But it is a nice- relaxing,subtle, scent. I will keep repurchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Cleans Well and it Smells Great
reviews.reviewText: I'd read several reviews that Mrs. Meyer's lavender scented laundry detergent was unpleasant, kind of musty, I have to disagree. I bought the lavender scented detergent because I like it, when I poured it in the washer, it smelled just like lavender. When I remove my laundry from the dryer the scent is very light barely noticeable. This detergent cleans very well, and I have the peace of mind knowing that it isn't putting harmful chemicals in the water system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff is amazing for pets!!
reviews.reviewText: Ok here me out. I have 2 little dogs that go on washable pee pads cause we have hawks in our yard. I wait till they pile up so i have a full load. So yeah they stink bad by the time I wash them. I was using a full cup of detergent a full cap of scent beads n 2 cups of enzyme laundry booster n there was always still n underlying musty odor. I have tried so many combinations of things I am using 80 bucks worth of products a minimum of 3 at a time just to try n kill the smell totally. I decided I wanted to see if just one product could do the job. I tried this n both me n my husband were amazed. Hot water, 1 hour soak n I did use a second rinse setting, there was no smell at all!! I didn't have to wash it a second time or even add extra product. I added exactly how much it said n there was no smell to them at all. I smelled no lavender which is the scent I got but I don't even care lol I am just so happy that I can buy n just use 1 thing to clean them n I don't have to wash them twice. Just to be sure it wasn't a fluke I repeated the process with my rat n guinea pig fleeces n once again 1 wash n no smell!!! I can't even express how happy I am. My husband told me to order 9 bottles so we don't ever run out I didn't do 9 but I did just order 4 more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product
reviews.reviewText: Laundry comes out clean, I don't smell the scent a lot on the clothes, wish it was a little stronger, but overall I am very pleased with this product, I have been using for a while now. I am a happy camper, YAY!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A little priceySmell great in bottleClothes really don't have a scent I have to use a scent booster and/or oxyThe dryer the clothes the more I need to use and wash which suck cuz I have little kids

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What's Really Good!
reviews.reviewText: I love this product! It works exactly as said! It only takes a little and the lather is amazing. I used it on my laundry as well as general cleaning...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Persil also works, but that detergent is itchy. This works also, smells like apples. I wish it smelled like lavender, but it's still ok. Does not rinse out well, but better than Persil. I'll get it again.
